AgnosticUI v2
Back to Components

Toggle Component

Interactive toggle switch for binary state changes with accessibility support.

Basic Toggle

Simple on/off toggle switch:

Size Variants

Toggle switches in different sizes:

Visual Variants

Toggle switches with semantic colors:

Form Integration

Toggle switches work seamlessly with forms:

Accessibility Features

All toggle switches include proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation:

  • Switch Role: Uses role="switch" for screen readers
  • State Communication: aria-checked indicates current state
  • Keyboard Navigation: Space key toggles state
  • Focus Management: Visible focus indicators
  • Label Association: Proper label-control relationship

React Integration

The ReactToggle wrapper provides seamless integration with React applications while maintaining all the accessibility features of the underlying web component.

Vue Integration

The VueToggle wrapper provides seamless integration with Vue 3 applications using the Composition API while maintaining all the accessibility features of the underlying web component.

Svelte Integration

AgnosticUI components work excellently with Svelte 5 using direct web component integration. This approach provides the best performance and reliability while maintaining full reactivity and all accessibility features.

Usage Examples

Code examples for different frameworks:

HTML / Vanilla JS

<ag-toggle checked label="Enable feature"></ag-toggle>
<ag-toggle size="lg" variant="success" label="Large green toggle"></ag-toggle>

React

// React wrapper components available via framework demos above

<ag-toggle checked label="Enable feature"></ag-toggle>
<ag-toggle size="lg" variant="success" label="Large green toggle"></ag-toggle>

Vue 3

<template>
  <ag-toggle :checked="true" label="Enable feature"></ag-toggle>
  <ag-toggle size="lg" variant="success" label="Large green toggle"></ag-toggle>
</template>
